name: Poker Supreme - Las Vegas
description:
Texas Hold'em is a very popular board game and we offer a wide range of poker games for you to choose from. You can challenge yourself against players from all over the world! This addictive game is sure to bring you more fun!

You'll start out as a poker rookie and advance step by step until you're a multi-million chip participant with the ultimate goal of becoming the supreme gambling king of Las Vegas!

Game features.
● Multiple poker playing styles
There is the classic Texas Hold'em and the super exciting bull game
Texas Hold'em: Players are dealt two bottom cards each and the table is dealt five public cards in turn, players are free to combine their two bottom cards with the five public cards to decide the winner by size
The game of bullfighting: a simple but very interesting poker game, each person 5 cards, according to the rules of the game to arrange combinations, and finally to compare the size of the decision to win or lose
1. The number of cards: 10, J, Q, K are 10, other cards are calculated according to the number of cards.
2. If the sum of any 3 cards is an integer multiple of 10, if the sum of the other 2 cards is not an integer multiple of 10, the number of cows in the deck will be based on the sum of these 2 cards. For example (4, 6, Q, 9, 9) the number of cows is 8.
●Upgrade Tour
As you get richer, you can participate in more and more high-end games.
Daily Gift
Keep entering the game every day and you will get a lot of gifts, including many gifts that you can give to other players and the most important currency in the game.
Rankings
Work your way up the rankings to become the top poker player!
Gift System
Give gifts to other players as you play against them, from flowers to rotten eggs!
● Chat Channel
Communicate using messages and animated emoticons. Take advantage of the opportunity to make a big score by cleverly bluffing or counter-exciting your opponents into fighting with you!
● Certified RNG
All games are guaranteed to be fair!

Note: We like fair games! We use the industry standard RNG (random chance) method and never manipulate cards or favor certain players. This poker game is intended for adult play (e.g., players 18 years of age or older). The game does not offer "real money gambling" or the opportunity to win real money or prizes (the game is for entertainment purposes only). Practice or success in community casino card games does not imply future success in "real money poker".
